word:
MR760 - Manuscript Release No. 760: The Integrity of the Sanctuary Truth (1980, 1981)


                      The Integrity of the Sanctuary Truth 
   A Group of Ellen G. White Statements Made in 1905, 1906, and 1907 
               Regarding Elder A. F. Ballenger's Teachings 

INTRODUCTORY NOTE: 
     FOR THE SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTIST CHURCH, THE FIRST DECADE OF THE PRESENT CENTURY WAS A TIME WHEN DOCTRINAL INROADS SERIOUSLY THREATENED.
